name: Orpheus but math and music
description:
Submisi Individual Game Jam Kelas GameDev 2021/2022

Theophilus Lukas Hotasi 1906398332

Story

You play as Orpheus, your wife has died before her time. Hades, ruler of the underworld and an avid mathematician and musician, might be generous enough to free her soul. But first you must confront him.

Game

Orpheus but math and music adalah game 2d jumper platformer, lompat terus melompat sambil berhitung, mendengar, dan mengingat. Salah memilih platform maka akan jatuh. Be careful, only those labeled with the right numbers are guaranteed to be solid.

Objective

Get to the top! or bottom...? bring your wife back

Diversifier
  • ASMR : Dengarkan suaranya, karena akan sangat mempengaruhi permainan

    Dengarkan pola lagunya, terutama level 2

  • Balas Dendam Lahan Mayat  : Awal game adalah akhir game

    you'll see

  • MANS NOT HOT : Implementasi fitur yang mewajibkan pemain berpikir secara matematis

    Brush up on your Fibonacci, Recamán's sequence, and Pi digits.

https://gitlab.com/Theophilus_Lukas/solo_game_jam

made as a solo game project for a game development course

Controls

all music by myself
